TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit EastAsianLunisolarCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar
Public MustInherit Class EastAsianLunisolarCalendar Inherits Calendar
public ref class EastAsianLunisolarCalendar abstract : System::Globalization::Calendar

summary.span: Represents a calendar that divides time into months, days, years, and eras, and has dates that are based on cycles of the sun and the moon.

span.span: Represents a calendar that divides time into months, days, years, and eras, and has dates that are based on cycles of the sun and the moon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別除了太陽能年及農曆月也支援在六十年為週期的年份 （重複每隔 60 年）。The class supports the sexagenary cycle of years (which repeats every 60 years) in addition to solar years and lunar months. 在行事曆中 solar 逐年是以六十年的年度與相關聯 (請參閱)，天干 (請參閱)，和糔礜惎纕分支 (請參閱)。Each solar year in the calendar is associated with a Sexagenary Year (see ), a Celestial Stem (see ), and a Terrestrial Branch (see ). > [!NOTE] > 如需有關使用資訊類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱 < [ 使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 年份可以有任何一年，月之後的閏月，一個月可有為閏日。A year can have a leap month after any month of the year, and a month can have a leap day. 比方說，方法會傳回正整數，表示指定的日期與相關聯的月份。For example, the method returns a positive integer that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8，第八個月內，如呈獻第八個月的 9 和 10，第九個月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month. 每個支援一組的行事曆。Each supports a set of calendars. 目前，有無陰陽曆類別衍生自任何支援的文化特性所使用的類別。Currently, none of the lunisolar calendar classes that derive from is used by any of the cultures supported by the class. 因此，這個類別以及從中衍生的可用只是用來計算的東亞洲的陰陽曆。Therefore, this class and those that derive from it can be used only to calculate dates in the East Asian lunisolar calendars. 這個類別支援數個 「 取得 」 的方法，以描述陰陽曆，所使用的詞彙中，方法來轉換從陰陽曆資料到。This class supports several "get" methods to describe a in the terms used by lunisolar calendars, and the method to convert from lunisolar calendar data to a .

span.span: A new that results from adding the specified number of months to the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 在此情況下，結果產生的 year 之月份中最後一個有效的日期會變更的日期部分。In this case, the day part is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分產生的月份超出指定的年份會受到影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，產生的 year 超出指定的紀元便會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是 10 月有 31 天，指定某一天是該月份中，第 31 天，而`months`參數為 6，則產生的 year 是其中一個多個指定的年份，產生的月份則是從四月，和產生的日期是三十一天，也就是在 4 月的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the thirty-first day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the thirtieth day, which is the last day in April. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 在此情況下，結果產生的 year 之月份中最後一個有效的日期會變更的日期部分。In this case, the day part is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，產生的 year 超出指定的紀元便會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，二月有 28 天，除了有 29 天潤年期間。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 指定的日期是否二十-第九個天，閏年中的 2 月，而`years`參數設為 1，則產生的日期將會在下一年度的 2 月二十八天。If the specified date is the twenty-ninth day of February in a leap year and the value of the `years` parameter is 1, the resulting date will be the twenty-eighth day of February in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年中的日被指從當年第一日的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，並的上個月的最後一天會傳回該年份中的總天數，這相同的值由。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在行事曆支援閏月之後在特定月份, 或任何一年中的每月之後，可能會發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 比方說，方法傳回的數字 1 到 13，表示指定的日期與相關聯的月份。For example, the method returns a number from 1 through 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8，第八個月內，如呈獻第八個月的 9 和 10，第九個月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以將目前曆法中的任何日期轉換為西曆日期。The method can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 為西曆日期，之後可用，比方說，來比較不同的行事曆中的日期，或在特定的行事曆中建立相等的日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year.

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year.

returns.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of the parameter.

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用屬性來判斷適當的世紀。The method uses the property to determine the appropriate century. 支援的兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 會導致方法將值轉換為四位數字值，根據值，表示適當的世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，此方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 應用程式提供四位數字值，超出支援的行事曆的範圍，則會提供為負數值，此方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

span.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許的 2 位數年份若要正確轉譯成 4 位數年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 比方說，西曆，如果這個屬性設定為 2029 之間，100 年範圍是從 1930年 2029年。For example, in the Gregorian calendar, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 這個屬性的初始值被衍生自 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分中的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 不過，這項資訊可以變更的存留期間。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定 中的變更會自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically.

span.span: The current is read-only.

exception.span: The value in a set operation is less than 99 or greater than the maximum supported year in the current calendar.

span.span: The value in a set operation is less than 99 or greater than the maximum supported year in the current calendar.
